details.top: Any Muslim servant who visits a sick person whose prescribed moment of death has not arrived and supplicates seven times:
details.arabic_diacless: أسأل اللٰه العظيم رب العرش العظيم أن يشفيك
details.arabic: أَسْأَلُ اللّٰهَ الْعَظِيْمَ رَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيْمِ أَنْ يَشْفِيَكَ
details.translations: I ask Almighty Allah, Lord of the Magnificent Throne, to make you well.
details.bottom: …then perhaps, for this reason, Allah will cure the person (if not near Death)
details.reference: At-Tirmithi, Abu Dawud. See also Al-Albani, Sahih At-Tirmithi 2/210 and Sahihul-Jami' As-Saghir 5/180.
